title: Job-Integrated Applied Mathematics Course Through Collaborative Learning

context.additional_context: An asynchronous e-learning course for current practitioners to enhance immediately applicable mathematical problem-solving skills in the workplace, maximizing learning outcomes through collaborative learning and feedback systems.

learning_goals: Collaboratively solve mathematical problems occurring in real job contexts through cooperative learning at least three times
Incorporate at least 80% of feedback provided through interactions with peer learners and instructors
Submit team-based project deliverables to evaluate practical applicability
Engage in constructive interactions at least five times per week on the LMS discussion board
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
